entries.name: Fire Giant

traits.name: Lava Strike
traits.effect: Searing blow crashes into the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Molten Hide
traits.effect: Blazing hide sears weapons, dulling harm.

entries.description: Ancient titanic warriors infused with the Plane of Fire’s essence.

entries.name: Frost Giant

traits.name: Glacier Slam
traits.effect: Bursts rime outward, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Frozen Bulk
traits.effect: Frozen bulk resists cutting force.

entries.description: Titanic giants wrought from glacial stone and bound to the cold north.

entries.name: Stone Giant

traits.name: Stonefist
traits.effect: A rock-laden fist crushes the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Earthen Bulk
traits.effect: Earthen bulk blunts incoming harm.

entries.description: Massive titanic guardians of mountains and valleys, shaped from rock itself.

entries.name: Mountain Giant

traits.name: Boulder Toss
traits.effect: Throws a hewn stone from range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Stalwart Frame
traits.effect: Earthen bulk blunts incoming harm.

entries.description: The largest of the stone giants, towering like mountains themselves.

entries.name: Ice Giant

traits.name: Icicle Spear
traits.effect: A freezing smash batters the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Permafrost Aura
traits.effect: Chill drags at the target’s steps, reducing speed.

entries.description: Colossal beings of frozen tundra, kin to frost giants but more primal.

entries.name: Sea Giant

traits.name: Tidal Smash
traits.effect: Kicks up a surge that damages nearby foes.

traits.name: Salted Hide
traits.effect: Sodden weight slows the target’s steps.

entries.description: Mariners of the deep seas; massive, barnacled titans who stride from surf to war.

entries.name: Storm Giant

traits.name: Thunderclap
traits.effect: A colossal impact stuns the target briefly.

traits.name: Storm Aura
traits.effect: Static drag slows the target’s steps.

entries.description: Immense titanic beings wreathed in lightning, heralds of titanic wrath.

entries.name: Iron Giant

traits.name: Hammerfist
traits.effect: A piston-strong punch slams the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Ironhide
traits.effect: Plated body shrugs off harm.

entries.description: Colossi of living iron, forged to guard titanic vaults and sanctums.

entries.name: Anubisath Giant

traits.name: Sandstorm Guard
traits.effect: A rock-laden fist crushes the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Shield
traits.effect: Earthen bulk blunts incoming harm.

entries.description: Jackal-headed stone giants forged by titans to guard desert ruins.

entries.name: Titan Watcher

traits.name: Runic Judgment
traits.effect: Runed force hammers the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Sentinel’s Resolve
traits.effect: Runes lock into a guarding shell.

entries.description: Titan-forged watchers tasked with overseeing ancient sites and enforcing order.

entries.name: Gronn

traits.name: Crushing Grip
traits.effect: A brutal clubbing strike deals direct damage.

traits.name: Stonehide
traits.effect: Stalwart frame resists staggering blows.

entries.description: Massive one-eyed giants native to Draenor, brutish but cunning, often ruling ogres and ogron.

entries.name: Magnaron

traits.name: Magma Slam
traits.effect: Detonates a heat burst, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Earthen Rage
traits.effect: Searing blow crashes into the target, dealing direct damage.

entries.description: Elementally charged progenitors of gronn, massive stone-skinned titans infused with molten fury.

entries.name: Ogron

traits.name: Club Sweep
traits.effect: Slams the ground, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Thick-Skulled
traits.effect: Shattered ground harms those who linger.

entries.description: Smaller cousins of the gronn, brutish servants and warriors who often lead ogre warbands.

entries.name: Colossus

traits.name: Monolithic Blow
traits.effect: Runed force hammers the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Immovable Frame
traits.effect: Runes lock into a guarding shell.

entries.description: Towering titans of Draenor, larger even than gronn or magnaron, whose presence dominates battlefields.

entries.name: Molten Giant

traits.name: Flame Crash
traits.effect: Ignites the ground into a hazard that harms those who linger.

traits.name: Lava Hide
traits.effect: Blazing hide sears weapons, dulling harm.

entries.description: Titans of flame and stone birthed from Ragnaros’s domain.

entries.name: Magma Giant

traits.name: Molten Burst
traits.effect: Detonates a burst of flame at range, dealing damage.

traits.name: Core Glow
traits.effect: Ignites the ground into a hazard that harms those who linger.

entries.description: Massive fire-touched giants composed of magma and ash.

entries.name: Fungal Giant

traits.name: Spore Burst
traits.effect: A root-knotted limb slams the target, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Regrowth
traits.effect: Creepers snag, reducing speed.

entries.description: Towering myconid-like giants that stride through marsh and jungle.

entries.name: Gemstone Colossus

traits.name: Prism Beam
traits.effect: Fires a cutting ray through enemies in a line.

traits.name: Crystal Hide
traits.effect: Earthen bulk blunts incoming harm.

entries.description: Shimmering crystalline giants, forged of earth’s deepest veins.

entries.name: Flesh Giant

traits.name: Slam of Gore
traits.effect: Runic scorch harms the target over several rounds.

traits.name: Sewn Bulk
traits.effect: Runes lock into a guarding shell.

entries.description: Undead titans stitched together by necromancers, used as siege monstrosities.

entries.name: Clockwork Giant

traits.name: Steam Slam
traits.effect: Vents steam in a burst, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Gearframe
traits.effect: Plated body shrugs off harm.

entries.description: Titan-forged constructs of cogs and gears; half-giant, half-machine.

entries.name: Ettin

traits.name: Dual Smash
traits.effect: Both clubs sweep wide, damaging nearby foes.

traits.name: Split Focus
traits.effect: Twin clubs smash in tandem, dealing direct damage.

entries.description: Primitive two-headed giants, brutish but unpredictable.

entries.name: Djaradin

traits.name: Flameforged Weapon
traits.effect: Damages up to two adjacent targets in a melee arc.

traits.name: Dragonhunter’s Resolve
traits.effect: Raises natural defenses to blunt incoming harm.

entries.description: Dragon Isles giants who live to war against dragons and their kin.

entries.name: Magnataur

traits.name: Tuskspear
traits.effect: Tuskspear gore drives in, dealing direct damage.

traits.name: Area Blast
traits.effect: Cracks ice in a shock, damaging nearby foes.

entries.description: Half-giant taurens of the frozen north, savage and cruel.

entries.name: Genesaur

traits.name: Nature Surge
traits.effect: Vines seize the target, preventing movement.

traits.name: Sapling Spawn
traits.effect: Calls allies or lesser giants to the field.

entries.description: Dinosaur-like plant giants, children of nature’s primal power.

entries.name: Biggun

traits.name: Massive Club
traits.effect: A towering blow deals direct damage.

traits.name: Thick Hide
traits.effect: Natural resilience dulls lesser weapons.

entries.description: Generic wandering giants with no special lineage but immense strength.
